description: This file defines a singly linked list data structure with methods for adding, removing, retrieving size, and accessing elements by index. It includes an internal Node class and a companion object with a tail function.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list implementation with basic operations such as add, remove, size, and get.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Internal class representing a node in the linked list, holding data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.
